data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Marseille.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
At Orange Velodrome, Saint-Etienne are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 4, Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Marseille.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 5, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Marseille.
Saint-Etienne take a 0-1 lead thanks to Romain Hamouma.
In the minute 6, Great play from Yvann Macon to set up the goal.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
In the minute 9, The away team replace Mathieu Debuchy with Aimen Moueffek.
In the minute 10, Ruddy Buquet awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Florian Thauvin of Marseille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Marseille.
In the minute 16, Saint-Etienne push forward at Orange Velodrome and Mahdi Camara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Marseille defence.
Marseille are coming forward and Morgan Sanson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
In the minute 18, Ruddy Buquet signals a Marseille throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Saint-Etienne are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Marseille just outside Saint-Etienne's area.
In the minute 21, At Orange Velodrome, Yvann Macon has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Duje Caleta Car (Marseille) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Saint-Etienne drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In Marseille, Adil Aouchiche of Saint-Etienne is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 27, Important block from the Marseille defence as Adil Aouchiche fires in a strike for Saint-Etienne.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Marseille's area.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Saint-Etienne's Charles Abi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
In the minute 29, In Marseille, Marseille push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Hiroki Sakai (Marseille) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 31, Ruddy Buquet waits before resuming play because Romain Hamouma for Saint-Etienne is still down.
Romain Hamouma returns to the field for Saint-Etienne after picking up a slight injury.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Marseille are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 39, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Goal kick for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 40, Marseille's Florian Thauvin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Saint-Etienne defender.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Leonardo Balerdi (Marseille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille attack but Leonardo Balerdi's header doesn't find the target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Saint-Etienne are caught offside.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Marseille throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Marseille advance rapidly upfield but Ruddy Buquet blows for offside.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Marseille.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Marseille.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Marseille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
The first-half has come to a close in Marseille.
Marseille's Morgan Sanson has been booked in Marseille.
The second-half is underway at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 46, Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a first substitution, with Marley Ake replacing Maxime Lopez.
Bouna Sarr is on a sub for Leonardo Balerdi for Marseille.
Claude Puel is making the team's second substitution at Orange Velodrome with Arnaud Nordin replacing Adil Aouchiche.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 48, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Marseille.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 50, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Free kick Marseille.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
In the minute 53, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Marley Ake hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Marseille.
In the minute 54, In Marseille Marseille drive forward through Valentin Rongier. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marseille are pushing forward but Florian Thauvin's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Marseille's Florian Thauvin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Saint-Etienne defender.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Zaydou Youssouf is replacing Romain Hamouma for Saint-Etienne at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 59, Charles Abi (Saint-Etienne) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Saint-Etienne push forward at Orange Velodrome and Charles Abi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Marseille defence.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Charles Abi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Marseille have a dangerous throw-in.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Denis Bouanga (Saint-Etienne) strikes at Orange Velodrome but his header is cleared.
Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Orange Velodrome. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 71, Marseille make their third substitution with Valere Germain replacing Morgan Sanson.
Claude Puel (Saint-Etienne) has taken off Charles Abi who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Alpha Sissoko is the replacement.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 73, Lucas Gourna Douath is replacing Yvan Neyou for the away team.
Goal! Denis Bouanga extends Saint-Etienne's lead to 0-2.
Arnaud Nordin with an assist there.
In the minute 77, Marseille have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Alvaro Gonzalez (Marseille) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Marseille in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Valentin Rongier with Kevin Strootman. This is the fourth substitution made today by Andre Villas-Boas.
In the minute 79, Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a fifth substitution, with Christopher Rocchia replacing Hiroki Sakai.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Can Marseille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
In the minute 83, In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 85, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Marseille.
Lucas Gourna Douath for Saint-Etienne has been booked by Ruddy Buquet and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Marseille throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 86, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Saint-Etienne push upfield but Ruddy Buquet quickly pulls them for offside.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick in a good position for Marseille!
Florian Thauvin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Marseille.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Marseille.
Free kick Marseille.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Marseille.
Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Marseille.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
